title: The Hair Loft, Eyeware at The Vantage, Recreational Areas
posting_body: ['Life at The Vantage is like nothing else in northeastern Ohio!', 'Our resort-like apartment community is ideally located a short drive from downtown Cleveland and just off I-271, making it getting around the Cleveland area easy.', 'Convenience is key at The Vantage, with Beachwood Place shopping mall located directly across the street and the Cleveland Clinic just minutes away.', 'Property Amenities:', 'Public Transportation Available', 'Clubhouse and Monthly Resident Events', 'Indoor and Outdoor Pool', 'Heated Garages', 'Swerve Grille', 'Sauna and Whirlpool Spa', 'Heated Underground Walkways', 'The Hair Loft', 'Intercoms', 'Eyeware at The Vantage', 'Recreational Areas', 'Gated Community with Controlled Access', 'Call Us Today!', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.', 'Photos may not be of your exact home.', 'Please contact us today for the most up to date information!', 'Professionally managed by GoldOller Real Estate Investments, a provider of Fair Housing and Equal Opportunity.']
